summary: The diff does not show an implementation of the requested logo-button-only style override in `frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx`. Instead, it modifies global styling/theme content and project metadata/summaries, which does not directly satisfy REQ-1 and introduces unrequested changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove the orange/gold button-style background behind the header logo/brand lockup by overriding the global button background styles for the logo button only (element with class `header-brand-btn` in `frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx`), including hover/focus/active states, without changing header background, logo sizing/scroll-compress behavior, or other header buttons’ styling.
missing_requirements.reason: No diff content shows changes to `frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx` or any CSS targeting `.header-brand-btn` to make it transparent across default/hover/focus/active states. The only visible CSS change is in `frontend/src/index.css` (theme variables), which does not evidence a scoped override for the logo button.

hallucinated_features.description: Large-scale updates to global theme/design tokens (many CSS variables for palettes, header colors, luxury gold/silver/ivory palettes, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1 asks for a scoped override for the logo button only, explicitly avoiding redesign or changes to other header elements; broad global theme variable changes are not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Claims/changes describing a new header design and assets (e.g., “Ultra-Minimal Prestige header”, “new transparent logo lockup (aurelie-lockup-transparent...)”, “fully transparent background”, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1 explicitly says not to redesign the header layout and not to change/replace the logo asset. The modified summaries assert unrequested header redesign and asset changes (even if only in documentation).

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata additions marking new feature requests AR-1/AR-2 as pending in `project_state.json`.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not ask to add or modify project tracking/metadata files; it asks for a frontend styling fix with specific constraints.
